eki deshapalanagnyayange winitha hasirim dakina sisun da eya aadarshayata gathahoth shishya prajawage winayata kumakin kumak siduwe dayi sitha ganu bariya. 1956 warshaye bala peraliyen pasu balayata path mahajana eksath peramunu aanduwe palamuwani parlimenthu raswima apriyel 21 wanida wiwrutha kala awasthawe mahajana jayagrahanayen uddama wu mahajanaya mathi sabaya athulata kadawadi risi lesa hasiruna aakaraya apriyel 21 dina "lankadipa" pathraya wartha kale meseya.
